body_html:
hey, my solution:
for windows:
sudo /bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /bin/env python pip install pbr

for MAC
sudo /usr/bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /usr/bin/env python pip install pbr

checkout this link for why use '/usr/bin/env' beforehand: http://www.junlulocky.com/blog/pythontricks
body_text:
hey, my solution:
for windows:
sudo /bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /bin/env python pip install pbr
for MAC
sudo /usr/bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /usr/bin/env python pip install pbr
checkout this link for why use '/usr/bin/env' beforehand: http://www.junlulocky.com/blog/pythontricks
body:
hey, my solution:
for windows:
sudo /bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /bin/env python pip install pbr

for MAC
sudo /usr/bin/env pip uninstall pbr ## important
sudo /usr/bin/env python pip install pbr

checkout this link for why use '/usr/bin/env' beforehand: http://www.junlulocky.com/blog/pythontricks
